Topic.Title: Newbie here. Need some help with locked exits.

Posts.EditableText: i plan to have the character require a carabiner for a zipline, but when I get to the Zipline, I try to use the carabiner on it, only for it to say I can't see it. The Zipline is locked, and honestly, this impairs me from making any progress on this first game of mine. Please help in any way you can.
Posts.HTML: i plan to have the character require a carabiner for a zipline, but when I get to the Zipline, I try to use the carabiner on it, only for it to say I can't see it. The Zipline is locked, and honestly, this impairs me from making any progress on this first game of mine. Please help in any way you can.

Posts.EditableText: If understand you correctly you have an exit called Zipline? If so then you won’t be able to see it (there may be a way that I don’t know), so you need to make an object, call it zipline and when you use carabiner on it it opens the exit .
Posts.HTML: If understand you correctly you have an exit called Zipline? If so then you won’t be able to see it (there may be a way that I don’t know), so you need to make an object, call it zipline and when you use carabiner on it it opens the exit .

Posts.EditableText:
Is the zipline an exit, or an object?

I think the default "use" command expects one or two objects, and will complain it can't see any other type of element (such as an exit, command, or turnscript).
Posts.HTML:
Is the zipline an exit, or an object?

I think the default "use" command expects one or two objects, and will complain it can't see any other type of element (such as an exit, command, or turnscript).
